title: Game Progress Route
content:
UASION] Let me help. I'll go and check on your Head Banker. Tell me more about this large fellow. It sounds like a robbery to me. I want to open an account. Leave.

If you choose to attempt the Persuasion check, you will need to pass a DC of 18. If you succeed, the Head Clerk will say that it is unusual but will agree nevertheless. He will hand you a temporary vault pass that will give access to the lower part of The Counting House. Interact with the Iron Fence next to the Head Clerk's table, th
